artist: Painter: After Nicolas Poussin; Publisher: John Murray
description: Group of gods, goddesses and stayrs in a clearing in a landscape; discarded jugs and robes(?) scattered about; tiger on left; horse in center; goat on right
inscription:
Date, and Inscriptions

in plate in black: N. POUSSIN / London March 20, 1823 Published by J. Young 65 Upper Charlotte Street, Fitzroy Square / and by / John Murray, Albemarle Street | on sheet in pencil: 2-231
title: N. Poussin
